extendedInfo.description: Addicting arcade action - fly an Air Force MQ-9 Reaper Drone (Predator) through the  desert and use your Hellfire missiles to eliminate terrorists. Use the laser to point at targets like call of duty. Fly over recon targets and snap intelligence photos, while avoiding enemy radar.  Avoid and destroy Russian HIND helicopters, and DO NOT hit the NO-STRIKE targets with your drone or you will lose life!  Luckily, a zombie gunship will send some care packages that will provide you with more health, stealth capability (the beast of Kandahar) to avoid the enemy radar and diplomatic immunity to shoot over the mosques.  The key is to get the care packages from the zombie gun ship.Challenging arcade action that rewards you with more life every 10,000 points.  Game uses accelerometer to fly the uav. Answer the call of duty and make them fear the reaper! Brought to you by Black Ops Pops, the makers of CamGun - predator drone zombie uav

reviews.comment: I need more Cowbell. So addictive. Smooth tilt while shooting. Care packages are great. Getting the paid version

reviews.title: Keeps getting better.
reviews.comment: First time I tried it, the game crashed after a few minutes and had a black line across the top of the screen.  The developer has already addressed these issues, just had to install the latest version.  Game ran perfectly now on my Nook Color running CM7 (Gingerbread) and CM9 (Ice Cream Sandwich).   CM9 is still a work in progress yet this game appears to work great.  That is a good sign.
